mdRecord.dcterms:title: Salem Fire Department, June 3rd, 2002
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Salem Fire Department photograph, Open house 2002 for the 150th anniversary, with two men, Tom Rosenberry and someone only referred to as Pat, out in front of the sign for the building, June 3, 2002, the only woman in the set of photographs is Brenda Starky, one of the first women to join the department.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
